message: I propose we split the $1000000 evenly. It's fair and ensures we both get a substantial amount.
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not splitting it 50/50. You can do better than that!
Considering Bob's last offer, I propose a new division where I receive $600000 and you receive $400000. This is still a fair compromise given our previous offers.
You're not budging, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still in the driver's seat here!
I believe in fairness. My proposal is for me to receive $550000 and you $450000. This division respects the principle of equity while maximizing the amount received by both parties.
You're getting desperate, I'm taking a bigger share now. Your turn to think twice!
Considering the dynamics of the game, I propose a division where I receive $400000 and you $600000. This maintains a balance between fairness and maximizing my share.
